TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_sumamad_sakauzip_nu_niyazu'a_mibuting, title = sumamad_sakauzip_nu_niyazu'a_mibuting, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/sumamad_sakauzip_nu_niyazu'a_mibuting} }

S.FORM: sumamad sakauzip nu niyazu'a mibuting,miadup,mikawaw tu nalimaan atu maluk tu umah,mingulngul maluk ku niyazu'ay,caay katineng tu paliwalay a kawaw,kyu caay kahacica ku kalisiw,tanengay sa i kaen. tapalen azihen ayza i nayay ku tanektekay a sakasilacul nu niyazu',kyu misaicelang ku niyazu'ay tu sapalekalaw tu kakawawen,tinaku; asu'ay timu nu Kaluluan,pipahanhanan tu kawaw,tasalamaan nu wawa; Ciwidaan u pinanam tu sakauzip i hekal,mitanam tu miadupay a a kawaw,miazih tu lukiyaw,Sakul a niyazu'miwawaw tu nalimaan,umahay lami',milihiza tu lisin; Cilakayan a niyazu'mitanam maluk,pacakay tu nipalumaan.

somamad sakaozip no niyazo'a miboting,miadop,mikawaw to nalimaan ato malok to omah,mingolngol malok ko niyazo'ay,caay katineng to paliwalay a kawaw,kyo caay kahacica ko kalisiw,tanengay sa i kaen. tapalen azihen ayza i nayay ko tanektekay a sakasilacol no niyazo',kyo misaicelang ko niyazo'ay to sapalekalaw to kakawawen,tinako; aso'ay timo no Kaloloan,pipahanhanan to kawaw,tasalamaan no wawa; Ciwidaan o pinanam to sakaozip i hekal,mitanam to miadopay a a kawaw,miazih to lokiyaw,Sakol a niyazo'miwawaw to nalimaan,omahay lami',milihiza to lisin; Cilakayan a niyazo'mitanam malok,pacakay to nipalomaan.
